title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: The software does not provide a user interface to define the default line delimiters for new files.
EB: The software should have a user interface that allows users to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR: To reproduce, consider the following scenario: 1. Launch the software on a Windows workstation used as an X terminal. 2. Open the preferences section. 3. Look for the options related to defining default line delimiters for new files.
